dependencies.description:
Bowtie is an ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner for short
DNA sequences (reads) from next-gen sequencers.
dependencies.name: bowtie

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.
dependencies.name: viennarna

description:
ShortStack is a tool developed to process and analyze smallRNA-seq data
with respect to a reference genome, and output a comprehensive and
informative annotation of all discovered small RNA genes.
name: shortstack

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
